original_text: But they were childless because Elizabeth was not able to conceive, and they were both very old.
korean_text: 엘리사벳이 잉태를 못하므로 그들에게 자식이 없고 두 사람의 나이가 많더라

sentences.original_text: because Elizabeth was not able to conceive
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리사벳이 아이를 가질 수 없었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and they were both very old
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 두 사람은 모두 매우 늙었습니다
